sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: France and Germany will support Ukraine for quote as long as necessary against Russia's unwavering aggression in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This promise was made on Sunday by both the French president Emmanuel Macron and German Chancellor Olaf Scholz as their meeting coincided with the 60th anniversary of the Elysee Treaty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Macron says if everything were easy we wouldn't have the reasons to celebrate this partnership and it wouldn't have reinvented itself constantly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This agreement is great when it manages to shake its destiny, revisit the priorities on both banks of the Rhine and the even greater power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Both countries are seeking to overcome differences laid bare by Russia's war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Schultz said that the European peace project was at a turning point and that strong Franco-German relations were more important than ever.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the eastern Donetsk region, these soldiers are being threatened by Russian tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: To push them back, they're going to need their own advanced tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But Ukraine's allies are divided over whether to supply them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More shells and more cannons are needed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We have enough handguns and grenade launchers, but we lack ammunition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Of course, something heavier like tanks would be good.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And inside Germany's coalition government, the Greens are unhappy with Chancellor Scholz's decision not to hand Leopard tanks over. Our partners have made it clear that they're now ready to deliver battle tanks. Germany shouldn't stand alone, but should join in this alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After several months of an almost frozen conflict in the Zaporizhia region, fighting this week intensified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: To show that it's in charge of much of the region, Moscow sent the notorious arms dealer Avikzabut there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Tens of thousands of Israelis gathered in Tel Aviv on Saturday for the third consecutive weekend of protests against the government's plans to overhaul the judicial system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Critics of the ruling coalition and the former premier Yair Lapid say the move could help Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu evade conviction in his ongoing corruption trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: What you can see here today is a demonstration in support of the country, said Yair Lapid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: People who love Israel have come here today to defend its democracy, to defend its courts, to defend the idea of coexistence and of common good.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The people here who love Israel, who came to demonstrate for a democratic Jewish state according to the values of the Declaration of Independence, will not give up until we win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the government says a power imbalance has given judges too much sway over law-making and governance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Netanyahu has pledged to press on with the changes despite the opposition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: New Zealand's ruling Labour Party has formally endorsed sole candidate Chris Hipkins as the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: country's new Prime Minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hipkins told reporters in Wellington on Sunday that outgoing Premier Jacinda Ardern has been one of the nation's great leaders and promised his government would help New Zealanders get through this tough economic time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The move follows Ardern's surprise announcement on Thursday that she was resigning no later than February 7th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hipkins will be sworn in as the 41st Prime Minister of New Zealand on Wednesday, with Carmel Sepuloni as his deputy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Southwest Germany has been blanketed by 20 metres of snow, causing traffic chaos and a number of accidents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the state of Saarland, roads were particularly affected and some cars skidded into crash barriers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Trucks had trouble getting up the smallest slopes and when some of them became stuck, the traffic behind them came to a halt too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Many drivers were simply overwhelmed by the conditions and the police reported over 100 accidents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Croatia, it was a similar story.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some roads had to be closed, including part of the main Rijeka-Zagreb highway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There were also storm-force winds in parts, and both ferry and catamaran services had to be cancelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Dubrovnik, snow ploughs were at work clearing the roads, but fortunately no major accidents were reported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The snow has also raised water levels in some rivers, and dozens of houses were cut off in Seasac, Moslovina County on Saturday.
